tweet: (2/2) That freedom, and the privilege to live in this great country, is truly something to be thankful for, today and every day!

(1/2) I would like to wish you and your family a Happy Thanksgiving! Today, as we reflect on what we’re thankful for, I ask that you join me in saying a prayer for those that cannot be with their families on this day because they are fighting for our freedom at home and abroad. pic.twitter.com/sQFNzCVefo

The @TSA wants you to know about the new ID requirements for flying in the United States. Please take the time to get a REAL-ID before the official switch. The change happens on October 1, 2020. https://www.tsa.gov/real-id
(2/2) I was proud to be the lead Republican cosponsor on this important legislation to ensure that our Supreme Court Justices are given adequate protection throughout their service to our nation.
(1/2) Yesterday, H.R. 4258, The Reauthorizing Security for Supreme Court Justices Act of 2019, was passed in the House of Representatives. pic.twitter.com/QnVTVC6att
I stand with Israel and my thoughts and prayers are with our brothers and sisters in the Holy Land as they face the latest attacks from Islamic extremists. I wholeheartedly condemn these attacks.

While Democrats are busy with their partisan witch hunt, I'm focusing on addressing real issues that are facing Floridians. Learn more about my latest legislation to address the educational and financial needs of veterans by modernizing the GI Bill. https://steube.house.gov/media/press-releases/steube-introduces-legislation-modernize-gi-bill …

This impeachment is completely partisan—all you have to do is read the transcript to see there’s nothing impeachable. Floridians are frustrated  because Congress is not doing the job they sent us to do. It’s time we put this nonsense behind us & focus on the needs of the country! pic.twitter.com/xJ2AqpCzVZ

Don't miss my latest op-ed in the @HeraldTribune in honor of #VeteransDay! Read all about my work to fight for veterans: https://www.heraldtribune.com/opinion/20191111/guest-editorial-veterans-keep-serving …
Happy Veterans Day! Join me today and thank a veteran for their service and sacrifice on behalf of our nation! pic.twitter.com/MKkKpjsqam

Beginning October 1, 2020, every air traveler over 18 years of age will need a REAL-ID compliant drivers license or another acceptable form of ID to fly. If you want to avoid any headaches, please remember to get your REAL ID by October 1, 2020. https://www.tsa.gov/real-id
No one likes changing the clock. That's why I'm supporting a bill that makes daylight saving time year-round. pic.twitter.com/EvXhEsoBDD
